channel.title: Refresh level information in postres DB's
channel.description:
1/ Where does redash store **dashboard level refresh** and other settings ? I cant see it in dashboard postres table . 2/ Specifically we want to find the dashboards / widgets that re manually triggered by users for operational health and refreshes on delays/failing (not queue lenght)- but couldn't find it any of the postgres tables .
The reason this is important is that a lot of users report that their refreshes do not work - and we want to set up operational metrics to track what all refreshes failed at widgets/Dashboard level / what all failed at dashboard level. Currently, I couldn't find either.

item.title: Refresh level information in postres DB's
item.dc:creator: redash-user
item.description:
@jesse please help/someone from team as per the notes on telegram for the support we need.

Read full topic
item.source: Refresh level information in postres DB's
